 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקִיק‎</span> **noun masculine** ==a thin cake==, ([[BDB#RV|RV]]) wafer (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a thin round cake of bread***), always of unleavened bread: [[Exod.29.23|Exod 29:23]] = [[Lev.8.26|Lev 8:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶחָד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְקִיק מַצָּה אֶחָד‎</span> [[Num.6.19|Num 6:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְקִיקֵי מַצּוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.29.2|Exod 29:2]]; [[Lev.2.4|Lev 2:4]]; [[Lev.7.12|Lev 7:12]]; [[Num.6.15|Num 6:15]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.23.29|1Chr 23:29]]. — [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">λάγανον</span>.
